data.title: School of Health Professions, Samford University
meta_keywords: Faculty and Staff;School of Health Professions;samford university;faculty;staff;staff directory
data.meta_description: Our faculty and staff have deep professional experience and are passionate about serving the students they teach.
data.text:
One of the most important strengths of the School of Health Professions is our exceptional faculty and staff. Our people are highly motivated and, themselves, answering the calling of their lives. They have deep professional experience, but equally as important, they are enthusiastic, passionate teachers â€” their commitment will make your time at Samford richer by far.
